meanings.def: a piece of soft paper, used especially as a handkerchief
examples: He wiped his nose on a tissue.
She grabbed a wad of tissues from the box and soaked up the spilt wine.

meanings.def: a collection of cells that form the different parts of humans, animals and plants
examples: Dyes were extracted by boiling the plant tissue.
She treats skin and soft tissue injuries in casualty.
Vitamin C helps maintain healthy connective tissue.

meanings.def: very thin paper used for wrapping and packing things that break easily
a story, an excuse, etc. that is full of lies

idioms.def: a story, an excuse, etc. that is full of lies
